items.author: Quentin Valembois
items.snippet: Niantic just brought their Spatial SDK to Meta Quest 3! Since the release of the passthrough camera API, developers now have real-time access to the headset's camera feed and Niantic (the Pokémon GO creators) used this opportunity to bring their solution to Meta's SDK with : Live Scene Meshing Semantic Segmentation Object Detection Centimeter-Accurate VPS This is a massive news for Quest devs… though these services are not completely free.
